name: Roll Or Fall
description:
An arcade/action game where you play as as the only non faulty robot from the factory  and you must defend yourself from the failed attempts of you.

How, you may ask? Throw your own two pair of wheels at them. But Watch out! You can only damage them if the tire you throw is the same size as them.

You also should care about the different sizes the wheels you have, because it might hinder your balance.

Will you roll,  or will you fall?
